result.description: Manges all the business logic for the components comprised in the Related Items panel. Takes an input for the Sysid (of a Configuration Item) to get related items for. Related tables are all configurable on the backend for this functionality. Fields shown is also configurable on backend as well.
result.name: Related Items

result.description: Manges all the business logic for the components comprised in the Properties panel on the Unified Map. For inputs, it takes the sysid of a CI and it's related class. The "module" is configurable for the extended properites that show along with what highlighted fields are shown on the cards. Highlights just leverages the standard SN platform field highlightling support which has its own tables and documentation.
result.name: Properties
